error.commonError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
error.blogNotFoundText: The blog you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
error.productNotFoundText: The product you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
error.failedToRemoveItem: Failed to remove item from cart. Please try again later.
error.cartUpdateFailed: Failed to update cart. Please try again later.
error.loginRequired: You must be logged in to perform this action.
error.invalidPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters long and contain at least one number and one letter
error.passwordUpdateFailed: Failed to update password. Please try again later.
error.missMatchPassword: New password and confirm password do not match
error.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

success.registerSuccess: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account.
success.sendMessageSuccess: Message sent successfully! We will get back to you soon.
success.resetPasswordSuccess: Password reset link sent to your email. Please check your inbox.
success.updatePasswordSuccess: Password updated successfully! Please log in with your new password.
success.updateEmailSuccess: Email updated successfully! Please verify your new email address.
success.updatePhoneSuccess: Phone number updated successfully! Please verify your new phone number.
success.sendEmailActivation: Activation email sent successfully! Please check your inbox.
success.sendEmailActivationFailed: Failed to send activation email. Please try again later.
success.passwordChanged: Password changed successfully! Please log in with your new password.

DataIntegrityViolationException: Data integrity violation. Please check your input and try again.
RuntimeException: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
UserAlreadyExistsException: User already exists. Please use a different email address.
UserNotFoundException: User not found. Please check your credentials and try again.
UserNotAuthorizedException: You are not authorized to perform this action. Please log in with the correct account.
VerificationTokenAlreadyExpired: Verification token has already expired. Please request a new verification email.
VerificationTokenNotFoundException: Verification token not found. Please request a new verification email.
EmailAlreadyConfirmedException: Email has already been confirmed. Please log in with your account.
ConversationNotFoundException: Conversation not found. Please check the conversation ID and try again.
ConversationAlreadyExistsException: Conversation already exists. Please check the conversation ID and try again.
ImageUploadException: Image upload failed. Please try again later.
BlogNotFoundException: Blog not found. Please check the blog ID and try again.
UserNotActivatedException: User account is not activated. Please check your email for the activation link.
InsufficientInventoryException: Insufficient inventory. Please reduce the quantity or choose a different product.
PasswordNotValidException: Password is not valid. It must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least 8 characters
